relation: Implement files quick preview feature (named Klook)
Add GUI option for the "Rename Inline" setting
Add "Icon Size" submenu to the Places Panel context menu
New Print manager KCM and applet (plasmoid) replacement, using C++
Advanced gid(1) plugin using both ID files and etags
As-you-type search for the search plugin
Session name API for plugins + automatic ctags database naming
Add optional document "minimap" to the Symbols view plugin
Improved remove trailing spaces on save
Provde a GUI option to disable requiring CTRL to Drag-n-Drop text
Add initial support for gathering OpenBSD's process information
Add support for xterm's 1006 mouse extension
Add option to change the line spacing
Add the ability to clear command line before using bookmarks for some commands
Add the --separate cmdline option for running in new process
Make the d&d popup menu optional
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Schedules/KDE4/4.10 Feature Plan" - KDE TechBase
textBeforeTable: kdelibs 13 kdeutils 12 kdesdk 11 kdeplasma-addons 10 kdepim 9 kdenetwork 8 kdemultimedia 7 kdegraphics 6 kdegames 5 kdeedu 4 kde-baseapps 3 kde-workspace 2 kde-runtime 1 kdelibs Contents done => completed in-progress => started, but not completed yet to do => not started yet Legend: Schedules/KDE4/4.9 Feature Plan (previous major release) Schedules/KDE4/4.10 Release Schedule See also: This is a list of planned features for the SC 4.10 release.
